JobFullDesc: Facebook’s Ads products impact how people live, what people buy, and which brands and businesses we invest in. All this must be done with a deep sense of responsibility. Facebook wants to invent a new future for advertising where we build for all the responsibilities we carry as one of the world’s largest advertising platforms. We are looking for Product Managers with a passion for doing the most cutting-edge work around Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. The Ads Machine Learning team harvests state-of-the-art machine learning to create meaningful connections between our billions of users and tens of millions of advertisers and local businesses. We are looking for a leader who has a proven track record of building strong PM teams (hiring and coaching), scaling organizations and setting long-term vision for ambiguous spaces. This Product leader will partner with teams of engineers, machine learning experts from around the world, data scientists, marketing managers, and others to build products that power Facebook's advertising business across our entire suite of apps: Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Messenger, etc.Additionally, you'll need to provide resources, coaching, and regular, actionable feedback. Our products enable scale, efficiency and quality in the work performed. This leader must be able to help define strategies for large, ambiguous product areas and help guide their teams on how to maximize impact through use of data and research to create effective
